entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries ending late this evening then partly cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 early this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 01 January 2023
